sentence.Network_en: Only 13 of the mitochondrion's component proteins are encoded by its own DNA.
sentence.Network_cn: 只有13种线粒体的组成蛋白质是由线粒体自己的DNA编码的.

sentence.Network_en: The mitochondrion is therefore a really essential part of the cell.
sentence.Network_cn: 因此,线粒体是细胞真正重要部分.

sentence.Network_en: The proteins are constructed in the cell, outside the mitochondrion, just like all non - mitochondrial proteins.
sentence.Network_cn: 蛋白质在线粒体外的细胞里制造, 正像所有的 非 线粒体蛋白质一样.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 线粒体(mitochondrion)是细胞中制造能量的结构，科学界也给线粒体起了一个别名叫做“power house”，即细胞的发电厂。一个细胞内 …

粒线体或粒体线（mitochondrion），是一种存在于大多数真核细胞中的由两层膜包被的细胞器，功能 [编辑] 遗传学 [编辑] 机能障碍与 …

list.abs: at the same time , mitochondrion respiratory chains also produce other free radicals , for instance mitoquinones radical and chryso-simple semiquinone radical etc .同时，线粒体呼吸链还会产生其他自由基，例如泛醌自由基和黄素半醌自由基等。

this review summarizes the oxidation damage to liver , mainly to liver mitochondrion , caused by exercises-induced free radicals and the current situation of the prevention by using Chinese medicine .综述了运动源性自由基对肝脏主要是肝线粒体的氧化损伤及中药对其防治这方面的研究现状，为今后这方面做进一步的研究提

turbulence out of myelin sheath , loosen of neurofilament , mitochondrion swell and vacuole change and dissolve of axis-cylinder and myelin sheath .电镜下示髓鞘结构紊乱、脱失，神经丝疏松，线粒体肿胀，空泡化，有轴索髓鞘溶解。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 20th cent.: modern Latin, from Greek mitos 'thread' + khondrion (diminutive of khondros 'granule')

means.word_mean: 1. an organelle containing enzymes responsible for producing energy
